text: 🤣🤣As Jugs would say… well played.
God how pathetic. These Harry Potter stars have made millions out of Rowling’s books, now they dare not even say her name for fear of cancellation.

Reminder to all stupefyingly stupid cretins sending me this montage to make some pathetic ‘gotcha’ point: I didn’t know any of these people were despicable sex offenders when these pix were taken. That’s why I’m now blocking everyone who sends it to me - including this berk.
Absurd.
Because he blocked me... but tell him from me he's talking absolute twaddle.
Tom Daley’s furious that this isn’t happening more…

I hesitate to proffer advice to the new mercurial Bob/Baz/Ben England management team given how brilliantly they’re doing, but to go full ‘sexy cricket’ they should surely pick @josbuttler as opener for the Test side and just let him tee off every innings? Would be thrilling.

Very good scoop (again) by Gabriel.. very bad look for Charles. This stinks. Can’t have the next Monarch accepting bagfuls of cash from controversial political figures - how many more times has this kind of thing happened? Need urgent full transparency.
Incredible story… and very plausible. Like many, I always thought Jill Dando was killed by a professional assassin, but nobody could work out why. Was it this?
Sure, just don’t use my money to promote bullsh*t like 150 genders.
Ridiculous.
@BeefGolf Yes
@BeefGolf I think if we play him down the middle, he’ll score 25+ for us.
Raphinha.

@CarltonPalmer @CraigErbs @jimycfc1 That documentary was ridiculously biased against the media, Carlton. It bore very little reflection to what actually happened. I know because I was there. And I have remained very friendly with Gazza ever since, do you not wonder why?
I can’t think of anything worse in the world than being at Glastonbury trapped amid a seething mass of sweaty stinking festival revellers.
TONIGHT - if you missed it first time, we’re airing the whole special again. 👇👇

I think Jonny Bairstow may be my favourite cricketer in the world right now. On and off the pitch - the real deal. Love his heart, passion, emotion, fighting spirit, attacking mentality, sense of humour, Yorkshire grit, brutal honesty. Keep doing it your way @jbairstow21 👍 https://t.co/oWauoEB2uw

Boris Johnson’s become a serial toxic loser for the Conservatives & Dowden’s devastatingly worded resignation letter could be the lethal blow to his premiership. Has a Geoffrey Howe/Thatcher feel to it - ferociously loyal senior cabinet minister finally snaps, sparking bloodbath.
